feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: iterator_traits -- リンク: 定義の説明に用いられているコードにリンクを追加
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/iterator/iterator_traits.md b/reference/iterator/iterator_traits.md
index c5c314468..393499fff 100644
--- a/reference/iterator/iterator_traits.md
+++ b/reference/iterator/iterator_traits.md
@@ -119,6 +119,7 @@ namespace std {
     using reference = typename I::reference;
     using reference = iter_reference_t<I>;
     ```
+    * iter_reference_t[link /reference/iterator/iter_reference_t.md]
 
     - `iterator_category`は、上から順に次のいずれか
         - `I`が`cpp17-random-access-iterator`コンセプトを満たす場合、`random_access_iterator_tag`
@@ -135,6 +136,7 @@ namespace std {
     using reference         = void;
     using iterator_category = output_iterator_tag;
     ```
+    * incrementable_traits[link /reference/iterator/incrementable_traits.md]
 
     - この時、`incrementable_traits<I>::difference_type`が定義されない場合、`difference_type = void`
 
@@ -195,7 +197,16 @@ concept cpp17-random-access-iterator =
     {  i[n]  } -> convertible_to<iter_reference_t<I>>;
   };
 ```
-
+* copyable[link /reference/concepts/copyable.md]
+* can-reference[link /reference/iterator/dereferenceable.md]
+* incrementable_traits[link /reference/iterator/incrementable_traits.md]
+* indirectly_readable_traits[link /reference/iterator/indirectly_readable_traits.md]
+* iter_reference_t[link /reference/iterator/iter_reference_t.md]
+* signed_integral[link /reference/concepts/signed_integral.md]
+* constructible_from[link /reference/concepts/constructible_from.md]
+* is_lvalue_reference_v[link /reference/type_traits/is_lvalue_reference.md]
+* convertible_to[link /reference/concepts/convertible_to.md]
+* totally_ordered[link /reference/concepts/totally_ordered.md]
 
 ## 例
 ```cpp example

entry.title: common_comparison_category -- 表記の統一
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/compare/common_comparison_category.md b/reference/compare/common_comparison_category.md
index ba9a1c749..e14632dab 100644
--- a/reference/compare/common_comparison_category.md
+++ b/reference/compare/common_comparison_category.md
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@ namespace std {
 
 `Ts...`内のそれぞれの型を`Ti (0 <= i < N)`として、共通比較カテゴリ型`U`は以下のように決定される。
 
-1. `Ti`の中に一つでも比較カテゴリ型でない型がある場合、`U = void`
+1. `Ti`の中に1つでも比較カテゴリ型でない型がある場合、`U = void`
 2. `Ti`の中に1つでも`partial_ordering`がある場合、`U = partial_ordering`
 3. `Ti`の中に1つでも`weak_ordering`がある場合、`U = weak_ordering`
 4. それ以外の場合、`U = strong_ordering`（`N == 0`の場合）

entry.title: indirectly_readable_traits -- fix type
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/iterator/indirectly_readable_traits.md b/reference/iterator/indirectly_readable_traits.md
index c8b9ef2e2..f57b71e1c 100644
--- a/reference/iterator/indirectly_readable_traits.md
+++ b/reference/iterator/indirectly_readable_traits.md
@@ -59,7 +59,7 @@ namespace std {
   template<has-member-value-type T>
     requires has-member-element-type<T> &&
              same_as<remove_cv_t<typename T::element_type>, 
-                     remove_cv_t<typename T::value_type>>; }
+                     remove_cv_t<typename T::value_type>>
   struct indirectly_readable_traits<T>
     : cond-value-type<typename T::value_type> { };
 }

entry.title: 型の文脈でtypenameの省略を許可 [P0634R3] -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正 (v2)
entry.summary:
diff --git a/lang/cpp20/down_with_typename.md b/lang/cpp20/down_with_typename.md
index 90eb921e4..edb703848 100644
--- a/lang/cpp20/down_with_typename.md
+++ b/lang/cpp20/down_with_typename.md
@@ -52,7 +52,7 @@ template<typename T> void f() {
   void g(T::X);     // エラー: void型の変数宣言
 }
 ```
-- P0634R3[link http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2018/p0634r3.html]
+* P0634R3[link http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2018/p0634r3.html]
 
 ## 例
 ```cpp example

entry.title: formatter -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正 (v2)
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/chrono/day/formatter.md b/reference/chrono/day/formatter.md
index 7dfaba5d4..9e5852b68 100644
--- a/reference/chrono/day/formatter.md
+++ b/reference/chrono/day/formatter.md
@@ -32,7 +32,7 @@ int main()
   std::cout << std::format("{:%e}", chrono::day{3}) << std::endl;
 }
 ```
-- std::format[link /reference/chrono/format.md]
+* std::format[link /reference/chrono/format.md]
 
 ### 出力
 ```

entry.title: formatter -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正 (v2)

index 5c5fcf1f2..4e2fd8c0a 100644
--- a/reference/chrono/duration/formatter.md
+++ b/reference/chrono/duration/formatter.md
@@ -59,7 +59,7 @@ int main()
   std::cout << std::format("AM/PM : {:%p %I:00}", chrono::hours{15}) << std::endl;
 }
 ```

entry.title: formatter -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正 (v2)
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/chrono/year/formatter.md b/reference/chrono/year/formatter.md
index 56a21bc95..8ef3af181 100644
--- a/reference/chrono/year/formatter.md
+++ b/reference/chrono/year/formatter.md
@@ -50,7 +50,7 @@ int main()
   std::cout << std::format(std::locale("ja_JP.UTF-8"), "{:%EY}", chrono::year{2020}) << std::endl;
 }
 ```
-- std::format[link /reference/chrono/format.md]

entry.title: operator-- -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正 (v2)
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_decrement.md b/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_decrement.md
index 79450e66d..6d8d25535 100644
--- a/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_decrement.md
+++ b/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_decrement.md
@@ -24,7 +24,7 @@ do
 while (!invoke(*parent_->pred_, *current_));
 return *this;
 ```
-- invoke[link /reference/functional/invoke.md]
+* invoke[link /reference/functional/invoke.md]
 
 と等しい。

entry.title: operator++ -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正 (v2)
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_increment.md b/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_increment.md
index 28de17ad0..f7985e01d 100644
--- a/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_increment.md
+++ b/reference/ranges/filter_view/iterator/op_increment.md
@@ -26,9 +26,9 @@ current_ = ranges::find_if(
   ref(*parent_->pred_));
 return *this;
 ```
-- ranges::find_if[link /reference/algorithm/ranges_find_if.md]
-- ranges::end[link /reference/ranges/end.md]
-- ref[link /reference/functional/ref.md]
+* ranges::find_if[link /reference/algorithm/ranges_find_if.md]
+* ranges::end[link /reference/ranges/end.md]
+* ref[link /reference/functional/ref.md]
 
 と等しい。

entry.title: 可変引数テンプレート [N2242] -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/lang/cpp11/variadic_templates.md b/lang/cpp11/variadic_templates.md
index 045a6d03d..616261863 100644
--- a/lang/cpp11/variadic_templates.md
+++ b/lang/cpp11/variadic_templates.md
@@ -401,4 +401,4 @@ void f(const T1& t1, const T2& t2, const T3& t3);
 - [N2191 Proposed Wording for Variadic Templates (Revision 1)](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2007/n2191.pdf)
 - [N2242 Proposed Wording for Variadic Templates (Revision 2)](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2007/n2242.pdf)
 - [N2488 Extending Variadic Template Template Parameters](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2007/n2488.pdf)
-- [N2555 Extending Variadic Template Template Parameters (Revision 1)](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2008/n2555.pdf)
\ No newline at end of file
+- [N2555 Extending Variadic Template Template Parameters (Revision 1)](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2008/n2555.pdf)

--- a/reference/chrono/reload_tzdb.md

 ```cpp
 return get_tzdb_list().front();
 ```

entry.title: is-integer-like -- 誤ったコードブロック後のコード修飾を修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/iterator/is_integer_like.md b/reference/iterator/is_integer_like.md
index d4b4118b6..ba4d9b2dd 100644
--- a/reference/iterator/is_integer_like.md
+++ b/reference/iterator/is_integer_like.md
@@ -71,9 +71,9 @@ concept _Integer_like = _Is_nonbool_integral<remove_cv_t<_Ty>> || _Integer_class
 template <class _Ty>
 concept _Signed_integer_like = _Integer_like<_Ty> && static_cast<_Ty>(-1) < static_cast<_Ty>(0);
 ```
-* is_integral_v[like /reference/type_traits/is_integral.md]
-* is_same_v[like /reference/type_traits/is_same.md]
-* remove_cv_t[like /reference/type_traits/remove_cv.md]
+* is_integral_v[link /reference/type_traits/is_integral.md]
+* is_same_v[link /reference/type_traits/is_same.md]
+* remove_cv_t[link /reference/type_traits/remove_cv.md]
 
 上記の説明のうち構文的な要件を素直に実装している。MSVCでは、128ビット整数が*integer-class*型である。

 }
 ```

 * move_sentinel[link /reference/iterator/move_sentinel.md]
